tinytiger 0.0.0.9000

Download TIGER shapes for congressional districts

Source: R/congressional_districts.R
tt_congressional_districts.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for congressional districts

Usage

tt_congressional_districts(state, year = 2021)

Arguments

state

FIPs, postal codes, or full name of states.

year

Integer year. Required. Years < 2012 are not currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_congressional_districts()
#> Downloading congressional districts for Congress "116".
#> Simple feature collection with 444 features and 12 fields
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: -179.2311 ymin: -14.60181 xmax: 179.8597 ymax: 71.43979
